Table.Name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
Table.Content: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

Table.Name: Backup Magazine
Table.Content: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

Table.Name: Bison Steak
Table.Content: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

Table.Name: Bundle of Fireworks
Table.Content: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

Table.Name: Bustling Fungus
Table.Content: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

Table.Name: Cautious Slug
Table.Content: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

Table.Name: Crowbar
Table.Content: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

Table.Name: Delicate Watch
Table.Content: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

Table.Name: Energy Drink
Table.Content: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

Table.Name: Focus Crystal
Table.Content: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

Table.Name: Gasoline
Table.Content: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

Table.Name: Item Scrap, White
Table.Content: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Table.Name: Lens-Makers Glasses
Table.Content: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to Critically Strike, dealing double damage.

Table.Name: Medkit
Table.Content: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

Table.Name: Mocha
Table.Content: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

Table.Name: Monster Tooth
Table.Content: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

Table.Name: Oddly-shaped Opal
Table.Content: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

Table.Name: Pauls Goat Hoof
Table.Content: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

Table.Name: Personal Shield Generator
Table.Content: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

Table.Name: Power Elixir
Table.Content: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

Table.Name: Repulsion Armor Plate
Table.Content: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

Table.Name: Roll of Pennies
Table.Content: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

Table.Name: Rusted Key
Table.Content: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

Table.Name: Soldiers Syringe
Table.Content: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

Table.Name: Sticky Bomb
Table.Content: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

Table.Name: Stun Grenade
Table.Content: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

Table.Name: Topaz Brooch
Table.Content: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

Table.Name: Tougher Times
Table.Content: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

Table.Name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Table.Content: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

Table.Name: Warbanner
Table.Content: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

Table.Name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
Table.Content: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

Table.Name: Bandolier
Table.Content: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Table.Name: Berzerkers Pauldron
Table.Content: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

Table.Name: Chronobauble
Table.Content: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

Table.Name: Death Mark
Table.Content: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Fuel Cell
Table.Content: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

Table.Name: Ghors Tome
Table.Content: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.

Table.Name: Harvesters Scythe
Table.Content: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

Table.Name: Hopoo Feather
Table.Content: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

Table.Name: Hunters Harpoon
Table.Content: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Ignition Tank
Table.Content: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.

Table.Name: Infusion
Table.Content: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

Table.Name: Item Scrap, Green
Table.Content: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Table.Name: Kjaros Band
Table.Content: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

Table.Name: Leeching Seed
Table.Content: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

Table.Name: Lepton Daisy
Table.Content: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

Table.Name: Old Guillotine
Table.Content: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

Table.Name: Old War Stealthkit
Table.Content: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

Table.Name: Predatory Instincts
Table.Content: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

Table.Name: Razorwire
Table.Content: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius

Table.Name: Red Whip
Table.Content: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

Table.Name: Regenerating Scrap
Table.Content: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

Table.Name: Rose Buckler
Table.Content: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

Table.Name: Runalds Band
Table.Content: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

Table.Name: Shipping Request Form
Table.Content: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).

Table.Name: Shuriken
Table.Content: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

Table.Name: Squid Polyp
Table.Content: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

Table.Name: Ukulele
Table.Content: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

Table.Name: War Horn
Table.Content: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

Table.Name: Wax Quail
Table.Content: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

Table.Name: Will-o-the-wisp
Table.Content: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

Table.Name: 57 Leaf Clover
Table.Content: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

Table.Name: Aegis
Table.Content: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

Table.Name: Alien Head
Table.Content: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

Table.Name: Bens Raincoat
Table.Content: Prevents 1 (+1 per stack) debuff and instead grants a temporary barrier for 10% of maximum health. Recharges every 5 seconds..

Table.Name: Bottled Chaos
Table.Content: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).

Table.Name: Brainstalks
Table.Content: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

Table.Name: Brilliant Behemoth
Table.Content: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

Table.Name: Ceremonial Dagger
Table.Content: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

Table.Name: Defensive Microbots
Table.Content: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

Table.Name: Dios Best Friend
Table.Content: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

Table.Name: Frost Relic
Table.Content: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).

Table.Name: H3AD-5T v2
Table.Content: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Happiest Mask
Table.Content: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

Table.Name: Hardlight Afterburner
Table.Content: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

Table.Name: Interstellar Desk Plant
Table.Content:
On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.

The plant heals for 5% of maximum health every 0.5 second to all allies within 10m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.

Table.Name: Item Scrap, Red
Table.Content: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Table.Name: Laser Scope
Table.Content: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack).

Table.Name: Nkuhanas Opinion
Table.Content: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

Table.Name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
Table.Content: All missile items and equipment fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack)

Table.Name: Rejuvenation Rack
Table.Content: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.

Table.Name: Resonance Disc
Table.Content: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesnt kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

Table.Name: Sentient Meat Hook
Table.Content: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

Table.Name: Shattering Justice
Table.Content: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Soulbound Catalyst
Table.Content: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

Table.Name: Spare Drone Parts
Table.Content: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.

Table.Name: Symbiotic Scorpion
Table.Content: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.

Table.Name: Unstable Tesla Coil
Table.Content: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

Table.Name: Wake of Vultures
Table.Content: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

Table.Name: Artifact Key
Table.Content: A stone shard with immense power.

Table.Name: Charged Perforator
Table.Content: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.

Table.Name: Defense Nucleus
Table.Content: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).

Table.Name: Empathy Cores
Table.Content: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.

Table.Name: Genesis Loop
Table.Content: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .

Table.Name: Halcyon Seed
Table.Content: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

Table.Name: Irradiant Pearl
Table.Content: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

Table.Name: Item Scrap, Yellow
Table.Content: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Table.Name: Little Disciple
Table.Content: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

Table.Name: Mired Urn
Table.Content: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be tethered to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

Table.Name: Molten Perforator
Table.Content: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.

Table.Name: Pearl
Table.Content: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

Table.Name: Planula
Table.Content: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).

Table.Name: Queens Gland
Table.Content: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

Table.Name: Shatterspleen
Table.Content: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

Table.Name: Titanic Knurl
Table.Content: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

Table.Name: Beads of Fealty
Table.Content: Seems to do nothing... but...

Table.Name: Brittle Crown
Table.Content:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.

Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

Table.Name: Corpsebloom
Table.Content: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.

Table.Name: Defiant Gouge
Table.Content: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.

Table.Name: Egocentrism
Table.Content: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 bombs (+1 per stack). Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

Table.Name: Essence of Heresy
Table.Content:
Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.

Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Eulogy Zero
Table.Content: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.

Table.Name: Focused Convergence
Table.Content: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

Table.Name: Gesture of the Drowned
Table.Content: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

Table.Name: Hooks of Heresy
Table.Content:
Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom.

Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Light Flux Pauldron
Table.Content: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

Table.Name: Mercurial Rachis
Table.Content: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

Table.Name: Purity
Table.Content: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

Table.Name: Shaped Glass
Table.Content: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

Table.Name: Stone Flux Pauldron
Table.Content: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

Table.Name: Strides of Heresy
Table.Content:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.

Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

Table.Name: Transcendence
Table.Content: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

Table.Name: Visions of Heresy
Table.Content:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.

Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

Table.Name: Benthic Bloom
Table.Content: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) random items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

Table.Name: Encrusted Key
Table.Content: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.

Table.Name: Lost Seers Lenses
Table.Content: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Makers Glasses.

Table.Name: Lysate Cell
Table.Content: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

Table.Name: Needletick
Table.Content: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

Table.Name: Newly Hatched Zoea
Table.Content: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.

Table.Name: Plasma Shrimp
Table.Content: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+40% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

Table.Name: Pluripotent Larva
Table.Content: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dios Best Friends.

Table.Name: Polylute
Table.Content: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

Table.Name: Safer Spaces
Table.Content: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack) Corrupts all Tougher Times.

Table.Name: Singularity Band
Table.Content: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runalds and Kjaros Bands.

Table.Name: Tentabauble
Table.Content: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack). Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

Table.Name: Voidsent Flame
Table.Content: Upon hitting an enemy at full health, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o-the-wisps.

Table.Name: Weeping Fungus
Table.Content: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

Table.Name: Blast Shower
Table.Content: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

Table.Name: Disposable Missile Launcher
Table.Content: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.

Table.Name: Eccentric Vase
Table.Content: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

Table.Name: Executive Card
Table.Content: Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remain open.

Table.Name: Foreign Fruit
Table.Content: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

Table.Name: Forgive Me Please
Table.Content: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

Table.Name: Fuel Array
Table.Content: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

Table.Name: Gnarled Woodsprite
Table.Content: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.

Table.Name: Goobo Jr.
Table.Content: Spawn a gummy clone that has 300% damage and 300% health. Expires in 30 seconds.

Table.Name: Gorags Opus
Table.Content: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

Table.Name: Jade Elephant
Table.Content: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.

Table.Name: Milky Chrysalis
Table.Content: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

Table.Name: Molotov (6-Pack)
Table.Content: Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second.

Table.Name: Ocular HUD
Table.Content: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Table.Name: Preon Accumulator
Table.Content: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.

Table.Name: Primordial Cube
Table.Content: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds

Table.Name: Radar Scanner
Table.Content: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

Table.Name: Recycler
Table.Content: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.

Table.Name: Remote Caffeinator
Table.Content: Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health.

Table.Name: Royal Capacitor
Table.Content: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.

Table.Name: Sawmerang
Table.Content: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.

Table.Name: Super Massive Leech
Table.Content: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.

Table.Name: The Back-up
Table.Content: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

Table.Name: The Crowdfunder
Table.Content: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

Table.Name: Trophy Hunters Tricorn
Table.Content: Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.

Table.Name: Trophy Hunters Tricorn (Consumed)
Table.Content: Looks kinda cool, but thats about it.

Table.Name: Volcanic Egg
Table.Content: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.

Table.Name: Effigy of Grief
Table.Content: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.

Table.Name: Glowing Meteorite
Table.Content: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.

Table.Name: Helfire Tincture
Table.Content: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning as damage. The burn is 0.5x stronger on yourself, 0.25x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

Table.Name: Spinel Tonic
Table.Content:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.

When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).

Table.Name: Her Biting Embrace
Table.Content: Become an aspect of ice.

Table.Name: His Reassurance
Table.Content: Become an aspect of earth.

Table.Name: Ifrits Distinction
Table.Content: Become an aspect of fire.

Table.Name: Nkuhanas Retort
Table.Content: Become an aspect of corruption.

Table.Name: Shared Design
Table.Content: Become an aspect of perfection.

Table.Name: Silence Between Two Strikes
Table.Content: Become an aspect of lightning.

Table.Name: Spectral Circlet
Table.Content: Become an aspect of incorporeality.
